reuo.resources.view

Class LoaderModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.view.LoaderModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.ListModel<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncLoaderModel

    public class LoaderModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ListModel<java.lang.Object>
    Provides a synchrnous ListModel interface to a Loader. When an element is requested via getElementAt(int) it will be loaded from the underlying loader, which may have the resource cached. This is only recommened for loaders that offer very quick access, because this will block the AWT event thread.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives
    See Also:
    AsyncLoaderModel

      Initializes a LoaderModel with the specified loader using indices as a source for valid entry identifiers.

        public LoaderModel(IndexedLoader<?,?> indexedLoader)

        Parameters:
        indexedLoader - the underlying loader
